name: Nice and cozy apartment in Kreuzberg, Graefekiez
description: Our cosy two room Apartment (70qm) in a vibrating neighbourhood gives you a perfect base for your stay in Berlin. It is located in a quite street, close to Parks, public transport, the canals and bars. Explore the city with our bikes and feel at home

name: Furnished room in well equipped serviced apartment
description:
Room in an apartment available. Apartment has everything needed for comfortable stay and is spotless serviced apartment with all amenities including dishwasher, washing machine, cutlery, utensils, smart tv, nice table setup for home office.

Duration is a set to minimum 3 months, but can be adjusted. Just send an inquiry and we can discuss about shorter rentals.

Note : 4th floor, no elevator
Bus stops in front of house door.

name: Luxurous game room with private bath in X-Berg
description:
Cozy private room in Berlin Mitte with private bathroom and over 500 original (retro) games!
This charming private room not only offers you comfort and privacy, but also unique gaming entertainment on various consoles and a huge OLED TV.
The room is perfectly furnished and equipped with everything you need. A private bathroom ensures maximum privacy. Ideal for solo travelers, couples or business travelers who want to both explore the city and relax.

name: Beautiful single-room studio
description: Experience the “real Berlin” in our small and cozy private apartment (35qm) located in the heart of Wedding in nothern Berlin. The apartment is made up for two people and is very quiet because it’s located in the back building of an old unrenovated house.

name: Unterkunft zentral in Berlin
description: The accommodation has 3 rooms, however, is only one for rent, as the rest of the rooms are children's rooms. Central location, very cosy and quiet location.

name: Room in Shared appartment in Friedenau
description:
I live in the district of Friedenau with my Polish and Welsh roomates. This flat is an awesome place because of the nice atmosphere we have here. We enjoy eating together, watching films and a casual beer

My room is 25 square metres with additional balcony. Good working environment due to a nice Sofa, computer desk and lots of natural light.

I also own a bike that I can lend if someone is interested, as well as a lot of GYM equipment, in case you want to workout a little bit while in Berlin :)

name: GreatStay-Koburger Str.14 VH,cosy nest for up to 4
description: Nestled in the heart of Berlin Schöneberg, this cozy apartment at Koburgerstr 14 Vorderhaus promises a retreat of tranquility and warmth. Spanning 45square meters, every corner of the space is thoughtfully designed to exude homeliness. As you step in, the expansive living room welcomes you, seamlessly blending with an open kitchen that's perfect for whipping up delightful meals. Whether you're curling up on the sofa or ascending to the high bed, comfort is guaranteed.

Directly at the Mauerpark, in Berlin Mitte, only 3 minutes from restaurants, cafés, bars and the legendary flea market. Tram and 2 subway lines on the doorstep. A small, cozy 35 sqm apartment with a balcony that invites you to have breakfast in the morning sun. A fully equipped kitchen. This is how you can enjoy the cultural metropolis of Berlin.
You will find all kind of sports in the neighborhood, like football, Basketball, Beach Volleyball, Tabletennis and so on.

The studio apartment is located in the heart of leafy Graefekiez in Kreuzberg, one of Berlin’s most popular & beautiful neighbourhoods with its many preserved historic buildings. The flat itself has a big balcony and views into the quiet and green courtyard. The apartment is fully furnished and offers full access to fresh bed sheets & lines, towels, wifi, and basic cleaning and washing materials. There is a washing machine and dryer in the building. name: Cosy studio with balcony in heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Looking for a cosy and quiet, yet central apartment in a buzzing, creative and beautiful Berlin neighbourhood? You're in the right place.
The studio apartment is located in the heart of leafy Graefekiez in Kreuzberg, one of Berlin’s most popular & beautiful neighbourhoods with its many preserved historic buildings. The flat itself has a big balcony and views into the quiet and green courtyard. The apartment is fully furnished and offers full access to fresh bed sheets & lines, towels, wifi, and basic cleaning and washing materials. There is a washing machine and dryer in the building that can be requested to use at a small surcharge. The bed is a queen sized double bed (160cm width) and the apartment has a storage space for your clothing and suitcases. Kitchen and bathroom are newly refurbished with beautiful marble tiles. The kitchen is equipped with a mini hob, microwave, fridge and a dishwasher as well as a nice working/ eating space looking out onto the balcony. The wide sofa

name: Haus direkt an der Spree mit Whirlpool und Sauna
description:
The dream house is located directly in Berlin on the Spree with a small boat harbor and 1000 square meters of park-like garden.

On the ground floor (with underfloor heating) is a living room,
the kitchen, a double bedroom, a bathroom with shower/integrated steam sauna and a Miele washing machine.
On the child-friendly upper floor is a large bedroom with double bed and a bathroom with jacuzzi.

In addition, there is a baby cot, a baby changing table and a baby running grill.

description: In this modern, bright loft with almost 4m high ceilings in an old industrial building, you can enjoy an unobstructed view of Berlin. description:
The flat is only 2 houses away from the mansion of the president of Germany in the heart of the city with amazing connectivity to the airport. It's on the upper (6th floor - with elevator) with a huge balcony to the southwest, directly over the river Spree.

The flat has just been fully renovated and everything is brand new, the bed, the kitchen, the bathroom, the floors, and walls BUT it is a work in progress! The planned separation of the space is not yet in place and it has few furniture.

name: 3BR Altbau Apartment in a quiet city location
description:
This 125m² newly renovated period apartment is located in the heart of Berlin, in a quiet street next to the new fashion and art epicentre around Potsdamer Straße. 4 metro lines as well as park and water access are in immediate walking distance.

The flat features 5 rooms, incl. 2 bedrooms, open plan living area w/ fully-equipped kitchen, a pampering bath + dining room. With its high ceilings, refurbished to the highest standard in a lavish Gründerzeit design the flat is an experience in itself.

name: Artist apartment
description: The very charming old building is 180sqm big,has 2 bedrooms, a living room and a studio space. Perfect infrastructure. Shops, markets, cafes and restaurants, wellness, transport links are located in the immediate vicinity.

name: Well located attic studio with sauna
description:
Our light rooftop apartment with its 150 year old wooden beams lies in the middle of a lovely neighbourhood. It comes with a small but stylish kitchen and a luxurious bathroom, equipped with a rain shower and a Finnish sauna. we offer Netflix, cable TV and very fast Internet. Your stay with us will be carbon neutral, since we fully compensate our emissions.

The apartment hosts up to three adults or two adults with children.

description:
A cozy, very sunny room (15sqm), in a large duplex apartment directly at the Tiergarten. S-Bahn and U-Bahn station ( U-Hansaplatz U9; S-Tiergarten S5, S7 and S75) are within walking distance within 3 minutes.
The room is fully equipped and towels are provided. The 40 square meters of kitchen-living room, both bathrooms and the 20 sqm balcony may be used. The shared apartment consists of 5 very friendly and open-minded people (all in their early 20s), who are happy to give you tips.

name: Modern studio apartment in XBerg
description:
Enjoy your stay in this cozy, centrally located Berlin apartment. The area offers a wonderful selection of restaurants and bars, with Berlin's clubbing scene nearby.

Thanks to its location in the second courtyard of a 1910 building, you will hear little from the street. Retreat from the busy city to a well-equipped kitchen and a laid-back atmosphere.

Note: The apartment accommodates 4 people with a double bed and a 180x200cm sleep couch, but it's better suited for 2 due to its size.

name: Luxury-Penthouse - central- quiet - great view!
description:
Unique luxury penthouse on the historic listed Stalin buildings of the GDR. Light-flooded with views up to the horizon. Absolutely quiet and yet in the middle of it. With all-around walk-in balcony (55 m2), garden use and private parking space. In addition, extremely good public transport connections by subway and tram, also right outside.

Great luxury penthouse, directly on a famous historic building. Very central, though extremely quiet. Own parking place.

name: Sunny apartment no.1 in Berlin city
description: Northern part of downtown (6 km or 25 min to Brandenburg Gate). Quiet, 2 rooms, 60 m² (650 sq ft), balcony, 3rd floor, no lift. 1-6 guests. Best public transport, supermarkets, lots of groceries. Full kitchen, washing machine. Free wifi, parking.

name: 110qm - Central flat ideal for Friends & familles
description: In our central spacious apartment no one comes up short. Whether city trip or workation, here you are right. At the dining table you can discuss your days in Berlin or you rest on the large couch and in the evening you relax in the bathtub. The fully equipped children's room, with toys and books for all ages, also makes children's hearts beat faster. You also want to be productive? No problem, there is a full-sized workstation and another desk.

Nestled in a historic building on Melchiorstr 26, this spacious 80-square-meter loft features a blend of modern design and charming architectural details. With one cozy bedroom and a versatile loft living room that doubles as a second bedroom, this inviting retreat comfortably accommodates up to six guests.

Quiet garden loft - ideal for working and living
description:
The ideal accommodation for quiet nights in the countryside and ideal transport connections can be found in the basement loft of our cosy, family villa.
A fully equipped kitchenette, an open rain shower and the parking space in front of the door offer all modern comforts. The S-Bahn lines S1 and S7, which are within walking distance, have excellent transport connections to the trade fair (15min), to the city west(20min) and east (30min), to Potsdam (15min) and to all public transport day/night.

description: Spacious room in the apartment of your host. Welcome to the exciting center of Berlin. name: Sunny room in cosy home ♡
description:
We offer a simple sunny room with a balcony, in a small cosy flat on the 4th floor. You are welcome to cook and chill in our well equipped charming kitchen with a sitting area and loads of sun.

Within 5 min from the house you find public transport (U6 and Tram, Seestraße) and a lot of Café's and Restaurants, from turkish over chinese to indian food. Several nice bars are scaterred around the neignourhood. Berlin central station is less then 20min away by bus or Tram.

name: Sunny space with huge balcony close to Maybachufer
description:
Welcome to our beautiful masionette Altbau flat in the famous Reuterkiez <3 Your room is southside, with a huge balcony. On your level is the kitchen and one bathroom, on the upper level are two more rooms and another bathroom. You can go on the roof aswell! There is a beautiful view over all of berlin!

Everything you need is nearby, right next to the Maybachufer and Weserstraße. Lots of amazing cafes and one of the best flea markets in town.

name: Beautiful apartment in trendy area near quiet park
description: Beautiful 120 sqm rooftop place (5th floor) overlooking a charming tree-filled park (Helmholtzplatz) in the heart of trendy Berlin downtown neighbourhood Prenzlauer Berg. One big living room and dining room combined, large balcony with panorama view of Berlin, open kitchen and two bedrooms (plus sleeper couch in living room). We're renting out our place for at least six months, and for a maximum time of two years.

name: Cosy and quiet flat in Friedrichshain
description:
The flat is one big room on the second floor.
It is bright and cosy with a balcony and friendly neighbours.
The kitchen is very well equipped and the bathroom modern with a shower and a bathtub. Their are supermarkets, bakeries, coffees and restaurants near by. The Tram is only five min walk away and is connected directly with Alexanderplatz, the main train station, Warschauerstrasse and Mauerpark. A big Park with coffee and beautiful restaurant is just around the corner.

name: Teilrenovierte Wohnung mit Charme
description:
Since the apartment is not yet completely renovated, I would like to continue renting to renovate it.
I thank everyone who supports me and rent my home

name: Small apartment in Friedrichshain
description: This small apartment consists of a sleeping room with a double bed, bathroom with walk-in shower, washbasin and WC.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer in Kreuzberg
description: This room is located in the middle of the Gräfekiez in Berlin-Kreuzberg in a quiet location with its own staircase in the side wing (2nd floor), its own shower/toilet. The windows face the large inner courtyard facing southeast. A connecting door leads into your hosts' living area; here is also the small courtyard balcony, which you are welcome to use upon agreement. The good infrastructure, restaurants, cafés and the direct proximity to the Landwehr Canal make this place special.

name: Relaxed in Berlin: Gardenflat in the cities heart
description: Bright and very quiet souterrain apartment with all windows facing towards the garden. It has a very spacious and well equipped kitchen, an eldery but functional bathroom with bathtub and a sleeping room with a double bed, shelves, armchairs and desk with comfy workchair. You can access the garden/terrace through your kitchen door to enjoy your coffee in the morning sun. We are welcoming you in a unique neighbourhood in the heart of Berlin!

name: Lichtdurchflutetes Apartment mit Dachterrasse
description: The modern apartment with a private rooftop offers all-day sun. It is perfect for relaxing in Berlin: fully furnished, high-speed WLAN, and fully supplied kitchen. Perfect for working and relaxing. Perfect public transport with a tram, Alexanderplatz is only 18 minutes away.

name: 87m² flat in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain
description:
Our flat is in the heart of Friedichshain, Berlin's uniquest and most authentic destrict - perfect for your city trip.

+ 3-rooms each 20m² & 2 balcony
+ 3min to U5 with direct connection to Berlin Mitte City Center, Alexanderplatz, Brandenburger Tor, Central Station
+ 10 min walk to Frankfurter Allee S-Bahn circle train with connection to airport (20min)
+ 10 min walk to Boxhagener Platz
+ 2 min to Lidl supermarket
+ hundreds of restaurants close by
+ large double bed and one sleeping couch

name: Gästezimmer für deinen Kurztrip nach Berlin
description:
A quiet and relaxed flair invites you to our beautiful old building apartment.
Whether a professional detour or a few days of sightseeing in Berlin.
With us, you will get your money's worth in terms of a relaxed accommodation in the urban jungle.
A forest outside the door and by train in 15 minutes to Kreuzberg or Neukölln.

My girlfriend and I are living in the apartment. So we share the kitchen and bathroom.
Of course, you are also welcome in our living area.
See you soon!

name: Helle Altbauwohnung im schönen Körnerkiez
description: The bright 2-room apartment is located in the middle of the beautiful Körnerkiez. Körnerpark, Tempelhofer Feld, many bars, restaurants and Turkish markets are in the immediate vicinity. If you want to get out of Neukölln, you can easily reach the Ringbahn or the U8 on foot. Due to the layout of the rooms, the apartment is especially suitable for couples. If you have mastered the four floors without an elevator, you can enjoy the time here!

name: Central Spacious Artist Apartment close to park
description: My Cosy apartment Has floor heating, modern bathroom, fully fitted kitchen, king size bed, gigantic flat screen television and a huge sleeping couch. It’s a 10 minute walk to Potsdamer Platz and a two minute walk to an amazing park. It has a local flair with local restaurants and cafés close by but it’s also super central near Brandenburg Gate & Reichstag

name: central - quiete - cool - 2 room apartment
description:
The offered apartment is located right on Kastanienallee, in the 2nd courtyard - in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Since the apartment is located on the ground floor, it is pleasantly cool, even with maximum heat in the city. Smoking is also possible on the terrace. The tranquility in the back house is in maximum contrast to life on Kastanienallee...
to the tram 1min, subway 5min/Eberswalder Strasse. 15 min walk to Alex.

name: Gehobene Terrassenwohnung
description:
In the green district of Mahlsdorf, you will find a wonderful retreat that scores with spaciousness, reserved luxury and green surroundings.

The whole apartment was built in 2022. The high-quality fixtures in the shower room, lockable windows, fully equipped fitted kitchen and floor heating are just a few highlights that create a very pleasant living atmosphere.

name: Doppelzimmer im BerlinerBed&Breakfast
description:
In the heart of Berlin, our guesthouse is located on the ground floor of a typical Berlin old building from the early 1895s.
In a private atmosphere, we offer you a pleasant, relaxed and inexpensive variant of your stay in Berlin in our
"Berliner b&b".
A sweet breakfast is included in the price with us.

name: Grüne 2-Zimmerwohnung an der Dahme
description: We want to provide you with our beautiful apartment for the holiday season. We live in the middle of the south end of Köpenick, close to the river lady and to the forest on the Wendenschloss. Not far you also have it to the big Müggelsee. Nevertheless, you can quickly get to the city center from Grünau with the S46 with the S46 to Neukölln, with the S8 to Friedrichshain or from Ostkreuz direction Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt etc.

name: Lovely flat close to the water Kreuzberg
description: This beautiful apartment is in the heart of Kreuzberg, a 3 minute walk from the canal next to amazing restaurants and bars and at the same time a quiet sanctuary. The perfect place to feel at home for your Berlin trip

name: Luxury house with garden!
description:
After a strenuous city stay, you can relax in our garden, bathe in the pool, grill on the patio and end the day with a sauna or cinema evening with 77"-4K TV and high-end sound.
Our house is located in the green Mahlsdorf district district in a quiet residential area.
You can reach the city in 25 minutes. There is a 4-minute walk to the bus. From there to the S-Bahn, regional train and tram 2 minutes.
The gardens of the world and the Wuhletal can also be reached in a few minutes.

name: Great 2-room apartment in Kollwitzkiez
description:
This 68sqm furnished 3rd floor apartment is situated in a renovated, typical Berlin building with huge living room, sleeping room, bright kitchen and bathroom.
The living room has recently been furnished in modern industrial design. The kitchen is fully equipped including washer.
Located in the charming Kollwitzkiez next to tram M2 station “Marienburger Straße” (5 min to Alex).
Within 50m: 24/7 supermarket, post office, butcher’s, numerous coffee shops/restaurants, pharmacy, designer shops.

name: Central & bright apartment in hip disctrict
description: The room is like a separate apartment. It has its own entrance, a pantry kitchen and bathroom. The door to our flat will be locked. We will have only contact on arrival & departure. (And if you have questions of course)

name: GreatStay-Mierenforfstr 11 VH links 2BR up to 4
description: Welcome to your home away from home in the heart of Berlin's charming Charlottenburg district. This delightful vacation apartment at Mierendorffstr 11 offers a perfect blend of comfort and style. With its spacious 45 square meters of living space, it's designed to ensure you feel at ease from the moment you step inside. The open living room seamlessly merges with a well-appointed kitchen, making it a breeze to whip up your favorite meals or enjoy a leisurely breakfast before exploring the city.

description:
Quiet, quaint room in the attic floor of a small single-family house. With mini fridge, kettle and private shower room.
The bathroom is on the ground floor of the house.

name: Fewo Rohrwallinsel Köpenick
description:
Our modern holiday apartment is located in the beautiful, green Köpenick in a quiet location and directly on the water. Even on rainy days, you can enjoy nature on the water here, under the covered terrace. This is a wonderful way to combine nature and city life, as restaurants and shops serving everyday needs are within walking distance.
Due to the very good transport connections, you can explore Berlin and its surroundings at any time. There is no boredom here...

description: I am renting my spacious 93sqm flat while I am away. You can enjoy my spacious modern place with a fully equipped kitchen und open dining area , living room , 2 bathrooms, one bedroom and one fitness/ guest room with a extendable couch as well as 2 balconies in the middle of Neukölln :) If you want to work from my place, there is a fast WLAN connection and enough space on the dining table and on the bar to work comfortably. At least I like to switch between those 2 places :)

description: I'm renting a 30qm room in Kreuzberg. Its a livly  lot of clubs, restaurants and interresting places like Berghain and Estsidegallery around the coner. Sithseeing, party or figure out the real alternativ Kreuzberg? You're welcome at my place!

name: Furnished well equipped apartment in Wedding
description:
Fully furnished and well equipped apartment available with a good connectivity to public transport.
Very peaceful, smart home, 20 mins direct bus to hbf.

The apartment is added for minimum 3 months duration but can be booked for shorter period (send an inquiry and we can speak about it

Apartment is suitable for business people or someone who wants to explore and have good time in Berlin and needs well equipped accommodation:)

Important note : Apartment is on 4th floor without elevator. :)

name: Spacious and comfortable private room with Balcony
description:
Private room

Modern, spacious and bright Room in an apartment available.

Apartment has everything needed for comfortable stay eg cutlery, washing machine, dishwasher, coffee maker, electric kettle, bed linens, duvet, etc. Looking for neat and respectful person who can keep the apartment well and have a good time in Berlin :)

If you are new to the city, I shall be happy to introduce you to the extent I know ;)

name: Über den Dächern von Berlin
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and quiet space. The Berlin City hustle and bustle is behind you. In our green district, you will gain new strength for further exploration of the capital. On our roof terrace you relax with a book, enjoy our dog Luna or unwind on the loggia.

name: private Kreuzberg room - central
description:
Offered is a quiet room in my apartment.
You are welcome to use the kitchen with everything in it.
Towels and bedding are provided.
The neighbourhood is quiet convenient, very close to shopping,
many cafees and restaurants, 1 minute away from bus and subway.
Parks and playgrounds are in walking distance.

name: Amazing "Altbau" apartment
description:
This stylish place is perfect for mid to long term stays.
Located just a stone throw from Torstraße, everything is walkable between Mitte & Prenzlauer Berg.
Friedrichshain park is just a few minutes away and the apartment has everything you need for you Berlin exploration.

name: 25 Quadratmeter Zimmer in Berlin Moabit
description:
25 square meters of room, in a four shared apartment, in Berlin Moabit. Equipped with one bed for two people and a sofa bed for one to two more people. 5 minutes walk to the nearest subway station (Turmstraße). Harmonious atmosphere within the shared apartment. The apartment has 2 bathrooms and another kitchen that can be used.
In the room includes TV, PlayStation4 with games and Netflix. A desk and music system.

name: Berliner Zimmer in Neukölln
description:
Beautiful so-called "Berliner Zimmer", 25 m² large and quiet to the backyard located in the middle of the lively Neukölln neighborhood.
Cafés, bars and restaurants as well as buses and U7, U8 are in the immediate vicinity.

Nice, big and comfortable room in Berlin Neukölln. You can find restaurants, bars and café just around the corner.

name: Double bedroom- Berlin (Central)
description:
I am renting out my lovely room in the heart of Berlin Neukölln.
The room is very cosy with a really comfortable double bed. It comes with high ceilings and huge window area and a french balcony, where the sun is shining through in the morning.

name: Sunny and clean

description:
Beautiful bright, fully furnished apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg - countless bars/restaurants/Spätis/Oberbaum Bridge in close proximity.
2 minutes walk from the U1 Silesian Gate.
